arts.ttl: Arsenal ignore Hammers’ danger man at their peril

arts.ttl: Hammers video reveals big training shift ahead of Arsenal clash
arts.sum: Nuno Espirito Santo’s arrival at West Ham has helped steady the sinking Potter ship. In the last few weeks the training videos had taken on a quiet, almost silent quality, very little shouting or banter: As many had previously commented, no leaders on the pitch.
